parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To assert, affirm, profess. Prolongation from the same as phemi; to assert.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Wise, learned, cultivated, skilled, clever. Akin to saphes; wise.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From moros; to become insipid; figuratively, to make as a simpleton.
